Definition: Raw binary payload of a single SAE J2735 Basic Safety Message (BSM), stored as a byte sequence before decoding.
Source/Provenance: DriveAZ-IOS App to DRIVEAZ-MSGROUTER to Cyverse
Notes: Decode with libsm decodeToJER for structured sub-fields

Definition: Ingestion time of the BSM at the server, in Unix epoch seconds (UTC), representing when the message was logged.
Source/Provenance: DriveAZ-IOS App to DRIVEAZ-MSGROUTER to Cyverse

Definition: Text label of the SAE J2735 message type decoded from the frame header (here: “BasicSafetyMessage”).
Source/Provenance: DriveAZ-IOS App to DRIVEAZ-MSGROUTER to Cyverse

Definition: Base32 geohash string derived from latitude and longitude, used as a coarse spatial index for the BSM location.
Source/Provenance: DriveAZ-IOS App to DRIVEAZ-MSGROUTER to Cyverse

Definition: Vehicle latitude in WGS84 decimal degrees (−90 to +90), decoded from the BSM payload at transmission time.
Source/Provenance: DriveAZ-IOS App to DRIVEAZ-MSGROUTER to Cyverse

Definition: Vehicle longitude in WGS84 decimal degrees (−180 to +180), decoded from the BSM payload at transmission time.
Source/Provenance: DriveAZ-IOS App to DRIVEAZ-MSGROUTER to Cyverse
